## Meeting Schedule

```{r, warning=FALSE}
Day <- c(1:1)
Date <- c("6/2")
Topic <- c("Setup")

meetings <- cbind(Day, Date, Topic)

kable(meetings, "html") %>%  
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "responsive"))
```
